name: Five Nights At Hubbit's
description:
How To Play (Because phone calls are outdated)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

1.Controls

Press space to use a camera flash. You only have 6 flashes, but you can refill it using the panel on the left.

In the panel, you can see 3 buttons. Reset Hubbit, Refill Flash Beacon, and Use Shock. There are also cameras on the right side of the office.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

2.Animatronics

Hubbit The Rabbit:  If he makes a purr like noise, press Reset Hubbit in the panel. 

Frosty The Snowman: If he makes a helicopter like noise, press Use Shock in the panel.

Charlie The Dog: If you hear vent like noises, go to cam 5 and stay on that cam until Charlie goes away.
